old:
有用な情報は――
いまのところ、無い
column2: There is no useful information at the moment.
speaker: Heinz

old:
誰もかれもが仲良くやれるなんて
そんな都合のいい話はない
column2:
No one can get along with everyone.
It's not that convenient.
speaker: Heinz

old:
真の平和、正しき統治――
その足掛かりはどこにある――
column2:
True peace, just governance--
Where is that foothold--?
speaker: Heinz

old: 忙しいんだ、後にしてくれ
column2: I'm busy, do it later.
speaker: Heinz

old:
いつでも力は貸す
だが、慣れ合うつもりはないぞ、覚者
column2: I will lend you my strength, but I have no intention of getting too familiar, Arisen.
speaker: Heinz

old:
我が騎士団の力、侮るな
覚者だけが、白竜の盾ではない
column2: Do not underestimate the power of our Order. Arisen are not the only shields of the White Dragon.
speaker: Heinz

old: 竜に選ばれし者の活躍――見せてもらうぞ
column2: Let's see what the dragon's chosen one can do.
speaker: Heinz

old:
明け暮れる戦いの日々――
その先に平穏はあるのだろうか
column2: Days of endless battles -- Is there tranquility beyond them?
speaker: Heinz

old:
何が起ころうと動じない心
それだけは、覚者にもひけをとらん
column2: An unwavering heart no matter what happens, that is something even the Arisen cannot match.
speaker: Heinz

old:
身を挺し、人々と竜を守る――
その覚悟こそが白衛騎士団の矜持だ
column2:
Risking your life, protecting people and dragons
That determination is the pride of the White Knights.
speaker: Heinz

old:
ゲルト騎士団長が留守がちだから
忙しくてかなわんよ
column2: Gerd, the leader of the Knight Order, is often absent. I am too busy to keep up.
speaker: Heinz

old: 本当なら、そばで学びたいことがたくさんあるのだが
column2: There are many things I would like to learn by your side, Lord.
speaker: Heinz

old: はっ！　って、なんだ、あんたか
column2: Huh! What, it's you?
speaker: Heinz

old:
おお――顔は覚えたぞ
俺は騎士団の副長ハインツだ
今後も色々あるだろうが――よろしくな
column2:
Oh--I remember your face.
I am Vice Captain Heinz of the Knight Order.
There will be various things happening in the future, but--please take care of me.
speaker: Heinz

old:
調査団と出かけた護衛隊の中には
俺の部下もいるんだ
もしあんたも行くなら、よろしく頼む
column2: Among the escort squad that went with the survey team, There are also my subordinates. If you're going too, I'll count on you.
speaker: Heinz

old:
アークから戻らなかった部下がいるのだ
やりきれんな――
column2: There are subordinates who did not return from the Ark. I can't stand it—
speaker: Heinz

old:
あんたはなかなか見所があると
騎士団長から聞いている
あらためて、よろしくな
column2: You have quite a presence, as I've heard from the Knight Commander. Once again, I look forward to working with you.
speaker: Heinz

old:
どうした？
顔に余裕があるな
ひと仕事終えたという感じだ
column2: What's up? You've got a look on your face like you've done your job.
speaker: Heinz

old:
どうも騒がしいが――
大きな命令が下りそうな気配だな
column2: Apparently there's a lot of noise-- Looks like we're about to get a big order.
speaker: Heinz

old:
いや、グリッテンの戦いは盛り上がったな
ついつい思い出してしまうよ
column2: No, the battle of Gritten was exciting. I can't help but reminisce about it.
speaker: Heinz

old:
犠牲は大きかったが――
けして無駄にはならない
俺はそう信じている
column2:
Sacrifices were made, but they were not in vain.

I believe that.
speaker: Heinz

old:
騎士団は欠員が補充されて
ほっとひと息だ
column2:
The Knights have filled the vacancy.
It's a relief.
speaker: Heinz

old:
そういえば最近あの子を見ないな
いつも元気な女の覚者だ
column2:
By the way, I haven't seen that girl recently.
She's always been an energetic Arisen.
speaker: Heinz

old:
そう、イリス――
騎士団の中でも人気があるんだ
column2: Yes, Iris is popular even among the knights.
speaker: Heinz

old:
ここのところオークもおとなしいな
ずっとこうだといいのだが――
column2:
The orcs have been quiet as of late, too.
I wish it could be like this all the time--
speaker: Heinz

old:
なんとか街を守り切ったが――
こんなに攻め込まれるとは前代未聞だ
column2: Somehow we managed to protect the town, but it's unheard of to be invaded like this.
speaker: Heinz

old:
戦況は一進一退という認識は
間違いのようだな
column2:
The perception that the war is going back and forth seems to be
wrong.
speaker: Heinz

old:
厳しい顔のレオを見たが――
何を始める気だ？
column2:
I saw Leo with a stern look on his face--
What are you trying to start?
speaker: Heinz

old: これは見逃せないと思ってね――
column2: I think this is something you can't miss, you know...
speaker: Heinz

old:
近頃、騎士団に参加したい――
騎士になりたいという者が増えている
column2:
Recently, more and more people want to join the Order--
want to become knights.
speaker: Heinz

old:
頼もしいことのように思えるが
皆、危機を身近に感じているということでもある
いったい、これからどうなるんだろうな
column2:
It seems like a reliable thing to do, but it also means that
everyone is feeling the crisis close at hand.
I wonder what in the world is going to happen now?
speaker: Heinz

old:
ミシアル様がひさしぶりに大階段を下りたと
うわさになっているぞ
column2: Rumor has it that Mysial has descended the grand staircase for the first time in a long time.
speaker: Heinz

old:
第二のアークにイリスが現れたってのは
本当なのか？
いったい何をしていたんだ？
column2:
Is it true that Iris appeared in the second Ark?
What on earth was she doing?
speaker: Heinz

old:
アークの破壊部隊が編成されるはずだから
わたしは志願するつもりだ
column2: Since the Ark's destruction squad is supposed to be formed, I'm going to volunteer.
speaker: Heinz

old:
うわさになっている覚者の討伐には
参加したくないからな
column2: I don't want to participate in the rumored subjugation of the Arisen.
speaker: Heinz

old:
わたしたちを責めたければ責めるがいい
しかし、街にほとんど被害はなかった
それは騎士団の奮闘によるものだ
column2:
You are free to blame us.
However, there was little damage to the city, thanks to the efforts of the Knight Order.
speaker: Heinz

old:
巫女が連れ去られるのを黙って見ていた
わけではないんだ
column2: I didn't just silently watch as the woman was abducted.
speaker: Heinz

old:
ミシアルが自ら闇に身を投げ――
誘拐犯たるイリスはレオが討伐した
そのレオは神殿に戻っていない――
column2:
Mysial threw herself into darkness—
Iris, the kidnapper, was defeated by Leo.
But Leo has not returned to the temple—
speaker: Heinz

old:
ジョゼフとクラウスの意見は対立し――
白竜は相変わらずまどろみの中――
column2:
Joseph and Klaus have conflicting opinions-
The White Dragon remains in a deep slumber-
speaker: Heinz

old:
なあ、おれたちはこのままでいいのか？
どこで何をすればいいんだ？
column2:
Hey, are we okay just like this?
Where should we go and what should we do?
speaker: Heinz

old:
騎士団長はレオが手を抜いたと主張している
ということは――
column2: The leader of the knights claims that Leo slacked off which means—
speaker: Heinz

old: はて、どういうことだ？
column2: Well, what is this all about?
speaker: Heinz

old:
レオとは戦いたくない
たとえ手加減されても俺は逃げる
column2:
I don't want to fight Leo.
Even if he takes it easy on me I'll run.
speaker: Heinz

old:
その代わり、見かけた魔物は片っ端から
切り捨ててやる
column2: Arisen, I will cut down every monster I see in my way.
speaker: Heinz

old:
最前線は譲ってやる
感謝するんだな
column2: I'll give you the front line. You should be thankful.
speaker: Heinz

old:
これまで幾つもの戦いがあったが――
騎士団と覚者がこれほど協力し合って
事にあたったことはなかったんじゃないかな
column2: There have been many battles so far, but the Knights and the Arisen cooperating like this, I don't think it has ever happened before.
speaker: Heinz

old:
今この時、ここにいられることが
誇らしくてたまらないよ
column2: I'm so proud to be here at this moment.
speaker: Heinz

old:
ゲルト騎士団長と仲間たちを
よろしく頼んだぞ
column2: I entrusted Gerd, the leader of the Knight Order, and his comrades to you.
speaker: Heinz

old:
正直言って、覚者の中にあんたがいるのは
助かるよ
column2: To be honest, it's reassuring that you're one of the Arisen.
speaker: Heinz

old:
レオは嫌いじゃないけど、なんだか
やりにくくてさ
column2: I don't dislike Leo, but somehow he's difficult to work with.
speaker: Heinz
